**Quick FAQ:**
Q: What locations do you offer?
A: California, Atlanta, Illinois, Texas, Kansas (City) and Buffalo

Q: Where can I find test IPs and test files?
A: Here: https://www.bluevm.com/about.php

Q: Do you support TUN/TAP, PPP, IP Tables, rDNS, etc...?
A: Yes we support all of those as well as offering free basic DNS, a free cPanel hosting account (for mysql/website/dns/email offload). Most of these functions can be enabled from our control panel.

Q: Do you offer live chat support?
A: No, we do however have an IRC channel for community support and first come first serve support.

Q: What kind of uptime should I expect?
A: You should expect 99% uptime, anything lower than that in a given month (assuming it isn't related to DDOS, failure to pay your bill, planned maintenance, etc...) can be submitted for credit off your next months bill.
